info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued March 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FOR WEDNESDAY MARCH 16... The Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection has issued a code ORANGE air quality alert for Wednesday, including for the Liberty/Clairton area, including Clairton, Glassport, Lincoln, Liberty, and Port Vue. A code ORANGE air quality alert means that air pollution concentrations within the region may become unhealthy for sensitive groups. Sensitive groups include children, the elderly, and people suffering from asthma, heart disease, or other lung diseases. The effects of air pollution can be minimized by avoiding outdoor exercise or strenuous activity. For more information on ground-level ozone and fine particles, visit http://www.airnow.gov and https://www.ahs.dep.pa.gov/AQPartnersWeb/
